actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to declare the public policy of the United States and to remove all legal obstacles to the use of gold clauses.

summary.text: Declares it the of the United States to allow Americans to enter into contracts requiring payment in curriencies of other nations, gold or gold coin.

titles.title: A bill to declare the public policy of the United States and to remove all legal obstacles to the use of gold clauses.
